mapper.insert: insert into board(write_no, title, content, id) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{id})
insert into board_image(write_no, imageFileName1, imageFileName2, imageFileName3) values(board_seq.currval, #{imageFileName1}, #{imageFileName2}, #{imageFileName3})
mapper.select: select to_char(savedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') savedate, write_no, title, id, hit, like_count from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from board order by write_no desc) A) B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
select count(*) from board where title=#{title}
select count(*) from board where content=#{content}
select count(*) from board where id=#{id}
mapper.update: alter table board_image drop constraint board_image_fk
alter table board_image add constraint board_image_fk foreign key(write_no) references board(write_no) on delete cascade
alter table board_like drop constraint board_like_fk
alter table board_like add constraint board_like_fk foreign key(write_no) references board(write_no) on delete cascade
mapper.select: select to_char(savedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') savedate, write_no, title, id, hit, like_count from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from board where title=#{title} order by write_no desc) A) B where rn between #{s} and #{e}

select to_char(savedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') savedate, write_no, title, id, hit, like_count from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from board where content=#{content} order by write_no desc) A) B where rn between #{s} and #{e}

select to_char(savedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') savedate, write_no, title, id, hit, like_count from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from board where id=#{id} order by write_no desc) A) B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
